text: gei goodou helekai gi mee bolo goodou digau madamada humalia i nia manu mai i godou damagiigi be di hai o di godou damana mai i mua nogo hai. Goodou ga helekai beenei gi mee, gei mee gaa dugu goodou gii noho i tenua go Goshen.” Joseph ne helekai beenei, idimaa digau Egypt hagalee hiihai gi digau hagaloohi siibi.
